text:
#Flooding affects millions worldwide and the future needs more engineers. 

Join @BrunelUni and @EnvAgency on Friday 11 Dec 10am BST to hear what it‚Äôs like to study a sponsored degree in Flood and Coastal Engineering and ask questions.  

Register now: https://t.co/SCyzVeQUb8 https://t.co/nb4RWbq2FS

urls.title: Flood and Coastal Engineering | Brunel University London
urls.description: This exciting new funded programme, developed in partnership with the Environment Agency will equip you with the knowledge you need for a successful career in flood risk management.

text:
Take your knowledge further with a Flood and Coastal Engineering MSc. 

Scholarships are available, full time for one year starting in September 2021 and will include a 3 month work placement at the @EnvAgency (subject to terms and conditions).

Apply now: https://t.co/cStzUAbhhi https://t.co/zyW1I5MMUT
@EnvAgencySE @BTPSurrey @reigatebanstead @WeAreOpenreach @BTPLondon @TandridgeDC

@DefraGovUK @EnvAgency How much money has been wasted ripping down decades old trees from every area, in the past two years?
Time to have a look at what local councils have been spending taxpayers money on!

Stop auctioning off woodland by county councils also.

#JoinedUpThinking

We are working with our colleagues from @EnvAgencyMids and @ForestryComm on a joint investigation into damage reported on the #SSSI area of the #RiverLugg in Herefordshire
